result.title: Dynamic programming problem? help.
result.content:
I was trying to solve this problem early on a practice contest but couldn't make it. I want to know if someone can explain me how to code the solution or at least what is the correct approach. I think is dynamic programming but I don't know how to code it. Also, I don't understand why the correct output for input 4 is 5, it shouldn't be 3?

Here is the link to the problem: http://coj.uci.cu/contest/cproblem.xhtml?pid=2997&cid=1366

Thanks!
